text: Fleeting - After resolving, this card is removed from the game.
Visible - Both players can see this card while it is in the story.
Sight X - The first X cards in the story are visible to you this round.
Inspire X - Next round you have X extra mana.
Inspired X - This round you have X extra mana.
Nourish X - The next card you resolve is worth +X points.
Starve X - The next card you resolve is worth -X points.
Build X - If you have a Robot in hand, increase its points by X. Otherwise create a 0:X Fleeting Robot in hand.
